titleStmt.title: A vievv of the ciuile and ecclesiastical lavv and wherein the practise of them is streitned, and may be relieued within this land. VVritten by Thomas Ridley Doctor of the Ciuile Law.
titleStmt.author: Ridley, Thomas, Sir, 1550?-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Adam Islip?] for the Company of Stationers,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A view of the ciuile and ecclesiasticall law.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
